title: Prices going up!! Lease before they go even higher!!
posting_body: ['APARTMENTS IN ENGLEWOOD CO', 'Villas at Homestead located in Englewood, CO is in the coveted Homestead Neighborhood and Cherry Creek School District.', 'Our apartment homes are surrounded by beautiful open space and walking paths with lush landscaping.', 'Villas at Homestead Apartments is everything you are looking for, convenient to shopping and dining at Streets of Southglenn and the Denver Tech Center, and minutes from the Light Rail and I-25.', 'Each apartment home has large open kitchens with stainless steel appliances and separate dining rooms, walk in closets, custom cabinetry and countertops.', 'Each apartment home offers large open floorplans for your comfort.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Follow This Link for More Information:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1100 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fireplace', '- Microwave', '- Cable/Satellite', '- Individual Climate Control', '- Private Patio/Balcony', '- Open Layout', '- Walk-In Closets', '- Garage', '- Ceiling Fans', '- Central Heat and Air', '- Vinyl Plank Flooring', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Linen Closet', '- Vaulted Ceilings', '- Roman-style tub', '- In-unit washer and dryer', '- Upgraded Kitchens Available', '- King-sized Bedroom', '- Custom Cabinetry', '- Separate Dining Area', 'Community Amenities', '- Additional Storage', '- Business Center', '- Laundry Center', '- Tennis Court', '- Easy Access to Freeways and Public Transportation', '- Playground', '- Clubhouse', '- Package Room', '- Short Term Leases Available', '- Basketball court(s)', '- Courtyard', '- Bike and Walking Paths', '- Outdoor Pool and Spa', '- BBQ Area', '- Street View', 'Pet Policy', 'Villas at Homestead welcomes your pets with a deposit, pet fee and monthly pet rent.', 'Our homes accommodate up to two pets per home.', 'Please note some breed restrictions apply.', 'Office Hours', 'M - F: 9:00 am - 6:00 pm', 'S: 10:00 am - 5:00 pm', 'Villas at Homestead', '6857 South Homestead Parkway, Englewood, CO, 80112', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'idm9zasB192D']
